name: LastLight
description:
Last Light is a 2D platformer developed using Phaser where the player assumes the role of an anthropomorphized candle venturing through darkness in order to find the fire to keep on living.

Press UP DOWN LEFT RIGHT to control the candle man and SPACEBAR in the third level to light the environment.

It takes a few seconds to load the game in the browser.

Programmer: Qingqi, Jerry

Map Designer: Jan

Art: Marcus
